00026 // lbann_comm .hpp .cpp - LBANN communication utilities

00029 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"
00030 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_exception.hpp"
00031 #include "mpi.h"
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace El;
00035 
00036 lbann::lbann_comm::lbann_comm(int _procs_per_model) :
00037   procs_per_model(_procs_per_model), num_model_barriers(0),
00038   num_intermodel_barriers(0), num_global_barriers(0), bytes_sent(0),
00039   bytes_received(0) {
00040 
00041   // Initialize parameters
00042   int world_size = mpi::Size(mpi::COMM_WORLD);
00043   if (procs_per_model == 0) {
00044     procs_per_model = world_size;
00045   }
00046   num_models = world_size / procs_per_model;
00047   model_rank = mpi::Rank(mpi::COMM_WORLD) / procs_per_model;
00048   rank_in_model = mpi::Rank(mpi::COMM_WORLD) % procs_per_model;
00049 
00050   // Check if parameters are valid
00051   if (procs_per_model > world_size) {
00052     throw lbann_exception("lbann_comm: Not enough processes to create one model");
00053   }
00054   if (world_size % procs_per_model != 0) {
00055     throw lbann_exception("lbann_comm: Procs per model does not divide total number of procs");
00056   }
00057 
00058   // Initialize model and intermodel communicators
00059   mpi::Split(mpi::COMM_WORLD, model_rank, rank_in_model, model_comm);
00060   mpi::Split(mpi::COMM_WORLD, rank_in_model, model_rank, intermodel_comm);
00061 
00062   // Initialize Elemental grid
00063   grid = new Grid(model_comm);
00064 
00065   // Initialize node communicators
00066   setup_node_comm();
00067   procs_per_node = mpi::Size(node_comm);
00068   rank_in_node = mpi::Rank(node_comm);
00069   
00070 }
00071 
00072 lbann::lbann_comm::~lbann_comm() {
00073   delete grid;
00074   mpi::Free(model_comm);
00075   mpi::Free(intermodel_comm);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void lbann::lbann_comm::intermodel_sum_matrix(Mat& mat) {
00079   bytes_sent += sizeof(DataType) * mat.Height() * mat.Width();
00080   AllReduce(mat, intermodel_comm, mpi::SUM);
00081   bytes_received += sizeof(DataType) * mat.Height() * mat.Width();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void lbann::lbann_comm::intermodel_sum_matrix(DistMat& mat) {
00085   bytes_sent += sizeof(DataType) * mat.LocalHeight() * mat.LocalWidth();
00086   AllReduce(mat, intermodel_comm, mpi::SUM);
00087   bytes_received += sizeof(DataType) * mat.LocalHeight() * mat.LocalWidth();
00088 }

00092                  mat.Height() * mat.Width(), DataTypeMPI, MPI_SUM,
00093                  intermodel_comm.comm, &req);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void lbann::lbann_comm::nb_intermodel_sum_matrix(DistMat& mat,
00097                                                  mpi::Request& req) {
00098   // Note: This reaches into the Elemental internals where presently
00099   // mpi::Request is a typedef of MPI_Request and the MPI communicator
00100   // is mpi::Comm::comm.
00101   MPI_Iallreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, mat.Buffer(),
00102                  mat.LocalHeight() * mat.LocalWidth(), DataTypeMPI, MPI_SUM,
00103                  intermodel_comm.comm, &req);
00104                  }*/

00106 void lbann::lbann_comm::intermodel_broadcast_matrix(Mat& mat, int root) {
00107   Broadcast(mat, intermodel_comm, root);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void lbann::lbann_comm::intermodel_broadcast_matrix(DistMat& mat, int root) {
00111   Broadcast(mat, intermodel_comm, root);
00112 }

00125 
00126 void lbann::lbann_comm::intermodel_barrier() {
00127   ++num_intermodel_barriers;
00128   mpi::Barrier(intermodel_comm);
00129 }
00130 
00131 void lbann::lbann_comm::model_barrier() {
00132   ++num_model_barriers;
00133   mpi::Barrier(model_comm);
00134 }
00135 
00136 void lbann::lbann_comm::global_barrier() {
00137   ++num_global_barriers;
00138   mpi::Barrier(mpi::COMM_WORLD);
00139 }

00141 void lbann::lbann_comm::send(Mat& mat, int model, int rank) {
00142   send(mat.Buffer(), mat.Height() * mat.Width(), model, rank);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void lbann::lbann_comm::send(DistMat& mat, int model, int rank) {
00146   send(mat.Buffer(), mat.LocalHeight() * mat.LocalWidth(), model, rank);
00147 }

00194                                   std::vector<int>& dests, int root) {
00195   broadcast(mat.Buffer(), mat.Height() * mat.Width(), dests, root);

00203 void lbann::lbann_comm::setup_node_comm() {
00204  
00205   // Get string specifying compute node
00206   char node_name[MPI_MAX_PROCESSOR_NAME];
00207   int node_name_len;
00208   int status = MPI_Get_processor_name(node_name, &node_name_len);
00209   if(status != MPI_SUCCESS) {
00210     throw lbann_exception("lbann_comm: error in MPI_Get_processor_name");
00211   }
00212 
00213   // Hash the node names and split MPI processes
00214   // TODO: Generate random salt. The salt must be shared across all ranks.
00215   std::string node_string = "hXFgQFNrqyL1mIsq";
00216   node_string += node_name;
00217   int hash = std::hash<std::string>()(node_string);
00218   mpi::Comm hash_comm;
00219   mpi::Split(mpi::COMM_WORLD, hash, mpi::Rank(mpi::COMM_WORLD), hash_comm);
00220 
00221   // Hash the node names again and split MPI processes
00222   // TODO: Generate random salt. The salt must be shared across all ranks.
00223   node_string = "BGqXbNZqxuXBV5lm";
00224   node_string += node_name;
00225   hash = std::hash<std::string>()(node_string);
00226   mpi::Split(hash_comm, hash, mpi::Rank(mpi::COMM_WORLD), node_comm);
00227 
00228 }
